properties.description: If you want to use a short phrase as the title for the entity being described, use the Primary Title field. If you want to name a species, organization or person, use one of the other fields in this section.
properties.title: Primary Title

properties.description: The required name, label or formal title of the entity being described.
properties.title: Primary Title

properties.description: This element is used to further classify the entity.
properties.title: Entity Type

properties.description: A brief description of the related item associated with the entity being described.
properties.title: Related Item

properties.description: Notes pertaining to the relationship being described.
properties.title: Notes

properties.description: A brief note pertaining to the relationship.
properties.title: Relationship Note

properties.description: The type of note.
properties.title: Note Type

properties.description: The dates relevant to the entity being described.
properties.title: Time Periods

properties.description: The type of date such as Create Date or Date Modified.
properties.title: Time Period Type

properties.description: A textual date such as a time period name, e.g. "the 20th Century" or "the Mesozoic era".
properties.title: Textual Date

properties.description: A numeric date associated with the entity being described.
properties.title: Numeric Date

properties.description: The type of numeric date such as Begin Date or End Date.
properties.title: Numeric Date Type

properties.description: A four digit year.
properties.title: Year

properties.description: A two digit month.
properties.title: Month

properties.description: A two digit day.
properties.title: Day

properties.description: A short text that amplifies the meaning of the date being described.
properties.title: Note

properties.description: Spatial location information about the entity being described, such as creation place, coverage place or current place where it is located, etc.
properties.title: Place Information

properties.description: The type of place being described such as, the Collection place or the Storage location.
properties.title: Place Type

properties.description: Name of a geographic location pertaining to the entity being described e.g. Country, Province, Region, etc.
properties.title: Geographic Areas

properties.description: The dates relevant to the specific place being described.
properties.title: Place Time Period

properties.description: A textual date such as a time period name, e.g. "the 20th Century" or "the Mesozoic era".
properties.title: Textual Date

properties.description: A time period name, e.g. "the 20th Century" or "the Mesozoic era".
properties.title: Time Period

properties.description: The type of numeric date such as Begin Date or End Date.
properties.title: Date Type

properties.description: A four digit year.
properties.title: Year

properties.description: A two digit month.
properties.title: Month

properties.description: A two digit day.
properties.title: Day

properties.description: Notes pertaining to the place date being described.
properties.title: Notes

properties.description: Notes pertaining to the place being described.
properties.title: Notes

properties.description: The role of the person or organization in relation to the object (eg Creator, Compiler, Principal Investigator, etc.)
properties.title: Role

properties.description: The name of the person.
properties.title: Person Name

properties.description: The role of the person or organization in relation to the object (eg Creator, Compiler, Principal Investigator, etc.)
properties.title: Role

properties.description: The name of the organization.
properties.title: Organization Name

properties.description: A reference to another entity from which the present entity is/was derived.
properties.title: Source

properties.description: Brief text describing the source.
properties.title: Source

properties.description: A descriptive note pertaining to the Source.
properties.title: Source Notes

properties.description: The type of context being described.
properties.title: Context Type

properties.description: Brief text describing the context of the item.
properties.title: Context

properties.description: A descriptive note pertaining to the Context.
properties.title: Context Notes
